archimate:SystemSoftware.name: Coordinator
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
The main management loop for the coordinator is handled in the DruidCoordinator class (including leader election)
It polls the metadata store regularly for new segments (1m default). A second job (1m cycle) tells what segments the Historicals should load (accounting for health, balance and replication) or drop.
ServerView and InventoryView monitor the announcements - along with DruidNodeDiscoveryProvider
